categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: In the early days of the Great Galactic War, a young member of the Sith species fought for the Sith Empire as a Sith Lord. The Sith participated in the Minos Cluster Campaign, specifically on the battlefront of Eliad. During a confrontation with Galactic Republic forces, the Sith Lord engaged the Jedi Knight Gnost-Dural in a duel but quickly lost to the Kel Dor Jedi. After the battle, Gnost-Dural took the Sith's lightsaber for further study into the Sith society.
